sourcesContent:
import styled from 'styled-components'; import React, { useRef, useEffect } from 'react'; import { ProductConsumer } from '../context'; import Rellax from 'rellax'; const Product = props => { const rellaxRef = useRef(); useEffect(() => { new Rellax(rellaxRef.current, { speed: 7, center: true, wrapper: null, round: true, vertical: true, horizontal: false, }); }, []); return ( {value => { const { singleProduct } = value; const mainImg = singleProduct.images[0].fields.file.url; return (
My first layer
